asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling upper-body character portrait of a seven-foot-tall monster. It has scaly skin and a long alligator snout that snaps open and closed. It also wears a lab coat. The scene is illuminated by strange laboratory lights, creating a horrifying atmosphere. The overall style emphasizes its reptilian texture and menacing jaws.
